prompt: Close-up, macro shot of a vintage Pulsar LED watch (circa 1970s) lying on a dark grey velvet surface. Focus is razor sharp on the LED display, showing a glowing red '12:00'. The casing is brushed stainless steel with visible wear and patina, highlighting its age. The lighting is soft and diffused, emanating from above and slightly behind the watch, creating subtle highlights and shadows that emphasize the texture of the metal. The background is blurred, drawing attention to the watch face. Photorealistic, product photography style. --ar 16:9
name: old-pulsar-watches-value-image-1.png

prompt: A vintage Pulsar P2 LED watch (stainless steel) on a wrist, partially obscured by a tailored grey suit sleeve. The hand is resting on a mahogany desk next to a vintage calculator and a fountain pen. The lighting is warm and ambient, mimicking natural light from a window, creating a sophisticated and professional atmosphere. Depth of field is shallow, focusing on the watch and the immediate surrounding area. The background is a slightly blurred office environment. Photorealistic, lifestyle photography style. --ar 16:9
name: old-pulsar-watches-value-image-2.png

prompt: An organized display of various vintage Pulsar watches (LED and analog) arranged on a light grey felt background. The watches are in varying conditions, some pristine, others showing signs of wear. The composition is clean and symmetrical, showcasing the diversity of Pulsar designs throughout the years. The lighting is even and bright, providing clear visibility of each watch. Focus is sharp across all the watches. Photorealistic, studio product photography style. --ar 16:9
name: old-pulsar-watches-value-image-3.png

prompt: A split-screen image. On the left, a high-resolution photograph of a mint-condition vintage Pulsar P3 Time Computer LED watch. On the right, a graph showing the increasing value of vintage Pulsar watches over the past decade. The graph uses a clean, modern design with a white background and blue lines. The lighting is bright and even on both sides. The image is visually balanced and informative. Photorealistic, informational graphic style. --ar 16:9
name: old-pulsar-watches-value-image-4.png

prompt: A vintage watch collector's workshop scene. In the foreground, a partially disassembled Pulsar watch sits on a workbench, surrounded by watchmaking tools (screwdrivers, loupe, cleaning cloths). In the background, shelves are filled with watch parts, boxes, and reference books. The lighting is a mix of natural light from a window and focused task lighting on the workbench, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The scene is slightly cluttered but organized, suggesting a passion for horology. Photorealistic, environmental portrait style. --ar 16:9
name: old-pulsar-watches-value-image-5.png
